name: Renovata Partners
overview:
Renovata Partners is an international Executive Search firm founded to service the requirements of Internet and technology clients. We focus on recruiting Chairman, NXD, CEO, CFO, COO, CTO, CMO, and VP roles across all major functions.

We have been working closely with founders, venture capital and private equity firms for over 15 years, helping to recruit exceptional leaders for their enterprises and portfolio companies. Our focus on innovative and hyper growth companies gives us a unique perspective on the best talent in the market, and on how to attract and integrate these executives. We have become trusted advisors to the key stakeholders who help to determine the success of these companies: the founders, the investors, and the executives who are thinking of joining a PE or VC-backed venture.

We are successful because we treat clients and candidates as being equally important. We stand out because we are a close-knit team of hardworking, innovative and enterprising individuals. We bring the combined experiences, knowledge and networks of the whole team to bear on each project.
